page.title: 02WOODINGDEAN CHILD ACTIVITIES
page.content: In Woodingdean there are lots of clubs and activities for children to take part in. They are held in the Community Centre,the Boys Club,the Youth Hut and school and church halls. The people of Woodingdean raised a lot of money to build an open _ air swimming pool.It is open all through the Summer. There are parks,greens and recreation grounds to play in as well. These are the activities and clubs that children can take part in:- Boy's Brigade Brownies Guides Sunday School Swimming Scouts BMX Track Cubs Tap Dancing Legionnaires Ballet Girl's Brigade Nautical Training Corps
